GFZ: 3D Geological Model of Berlin

Source: vignettes/gfz_geological-model-berlin.Rmd
gfz_geological-model-berlin.Rmd

Cite as: Frick, Maximilian; Bott, Judith; Scheck-Wenderoth, Magdalena; Cacace, Mauro; Haacke, Nasrin; Schneider, Michael (2020): 3D geological model of Berlin - Germany. GFZ Data Services. https://doi.org/10.5880/GFZ.4.5.2020.005

Define Paths 

library(kwb.impetus)

paths_list <- list(
  base_url = "https://datapub.gfz-potsdam.de/download/10.5880.GFZ.4.5.2020.005nuirg",
  dataset = "<base_url>/2020-005_Frick-et-al_Berlin-Model_data.zip", 
  metadata = "<base_url>/2020-005_Frick-et-al_Berlin-Model_data-description.pdf",
  model_data = "model_gfz"
)

paths <- kwb.utils::resolve(paths_list)

Download

Download the GFZ Model Dataset (2020-005_Frick-et-al_Berlin-Model_data.zip).

Metadata is available here: (2020-005_Frick-et-al_Berlin-Model_data-description.pdf)

# archive::archive_extract(archive = paths$dataset, 
#                          dir = paths$model_data)

kwb.impetus::download_gfz_model(target_dir = paths$model_data)
#> ⠙ 5 extracted |  38 MB (10.0 MB/s) | 3.8s
#> ⠹ 10 extracted |  92 MB ( 13 MB/s) | 6.8s
#> ⠸ 23 extracted | 211 MB ( 20 MB/s) | 10.3s
#> ⠼ 37 extracted | 346 MB ( 26 MB/s) | 13.1s

Import 

elevation <- kwb.impetus::read_gfz_layers(paths$model_data, type = "elevation")
#> Reading (1/24): 'model_gfz/1_Holocene_elevation.dat' ... ok. (4.43s) 
#> Reading (2/24): 'model_gfz/10_Lower_Cretaceous_elevation.dat' ... ok. (0.99s) 
#> Reading (3/24): 'model_gfz/11_Jurassic_elevation.dat' ... ok. (1.23s) 
#> Reading (4/24): 'model_gfz/12_Keuper_elevation.dat' ... ok. (0.93s) 
#> Reading (5/24): 'model_gfz/13_Muschelkalk_elevation.dat' ... ok. (0.94s) 
#> Reading (6/24): 'model_gfz/14_Upper_Buntsandstein_elevation.dat' ... ok. (0.92s) 
#> Reading (7/24): 'model_gfz/15_Middle_Buntsandstein_elevation.dat' ... ok. (0.95s) 
#> Reading (8/24): 'model_gfz/16_Lower_Buntsandstein_elevation.dat' ... ok. (1.18s) 
#> Reading (9/24): 'model_gfz/17_Zechstein_elevation.dat' ... ok. (0.91s) 
#> Reading (10/24): 'model_gfz/18_Rotliegend_elevation.dat' ... ok. (0.96s) 
#> Reading (11/24): 'model_gfz/19_Permo-Carboniferous_elevation.dat' ... ok. (1.13s)

#> Reading (15/24): 'model_gfz/22_Lower_Crust_elevation.dat' ... ok. (0.84s) 
#> Reading (16/24): 'model_gfz/23_Upper_Mantle_elevation.dat' ... ok. (0.93s) 
#> Reading (17/24): 'model_gfz/24_LAB_elevation.dat' ... ok. (0.86s) 
#> Reading (18/24): 'model_gfz/3_Holstein_elevation.dat' ... ok. (0.89s) 
#> Reading (19/24): 'model_gfz/4_Elsterian_elevation.dat' ... ok. (1.10s) 
#> Reading (20/24): 'model_gfz/5_Miocene_elevation.dat' ... ok. (0.82s)

#> Reading (24/24): 'model_gfz/9_Upper_Cretaceous_elevation.dat' ... ok. (1.08s)
thickness <- kwb.impetus::read_gfz_layers(paths$model_data, type = "thickness")
#> Reading (1/23): 'model_gfz/1_Holocene_thickness.dat' ... ok. (1.16s)

Plot

Layer Thickness 

t_01 <- kwb.impetus::plot_gfz_layer(thickness$`1_Holocene`)
#> Warning: cannot handle curvilinear or sheared stars images. Rendering regular
#> grid.
htmlwidgets::saveWidget(t_01, file = "thickness_01-holocene.html")

Layer Elevation 

e_01 <- kwb.impetus::plot_gfz_layer(elevation$`1_Holocene`)
#> Warning: cannot handle curvilinear or sheared stars images. Rendering regular
#> grid.
htmlwidgets::saveWidget(e_01, 
                        file = "elevation_01-holocene.html")
